headline: Here Are Tuesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Alphabet, Amazon.com, Deckers Outdoors, DraftKings, Microsoft, Qualys, Zscaler and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: The futures are trading lower for the fourth consecutive day, following deep selling on Monday, particularly in some of the major technology names, such as NVIDIA Corp. (NASDAQ: NVDA), after it was disclosed that billionaire Peter Thiel had sold his entire position in the stock during the third quarter. This comes on ...
